description: net: shorten composite literal field values

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

FYI

http://codereview.appspot.com/5449070/diff/3001/src/pkg/net/dict/dict.go
File src/pkg/net/dict/dict.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5449070/diff/3001/src/pkg/net/dict/dict.go#newcode130
src/pkg/net/dict/dict.go:130: d := &Defn{Word: a[0], Dict: {a[1], a[2]}}
I'd leave this file alone - no real win
